TS2339_PropertyAccess.description: Property does not exist on type
TS2339_PropertyAccess.solution: Extend canonical types with missing properties

patterns.pattern: Property 'startDate' does not exist on type 'SeasonInfo'
patterns.fix: Add startDate?: Date | string to SeasonInfo interface

patterns.pattern: Property 'seasonNumber' does not exist on type 'SeasonInfo'
patterns.fix: Add seasonNumber?: number to SeasonInfo interface

patterns.pattern: Property 'isOnMarket' does not exist on type 'Player'
patterns.fix: Add isOnMarket?: boolean to PlayerWithContract interface

patterns.pattern: Property 'rosterPosition' does not exist on type 'Player'
patterns.fix: Change rosterPosition type from number to string in PlayerWithContract

patterns.pattern: Property 'staff' does not exist on type 'Contract'
patterns.fix: Add staff?: Staff to Contract interface

patterns.pattern: Property 'text' does not exist on type 'MatchEvent'
patterns.fix: Add text?: string to MatchEvent interface

TS2322_TypeAssignment.description: Type is not assignable to type
TS2322_TypeAssignment.rootCause: Type mismatches between expected and actual
TS2322_TypeAssignment.solution: Add type conversions or update interface definitions

patterns.pattern: Type 'string | number' is not assignable to type 'string'
Type 'number' is not assignable to type 'string'
Type 'undefined' is not assignable to type 'number'
patterns.fix: Add ?? 0 fallback or make property optional

TS2345_ArgumentType.rootCause: Parameters don't match expected function signature
TS2345_ArgumentType.solution: Convert parameters or update function signatures

patterns.pattern: Argument of type 'number' is not assignable to parameter of type 'string'
Argument of type 'PlayerData' is not assignable to parameter of type 'Player'
patterns.fix: Use proper type annotation: (p: any) => or cast to Player

TS2353_ObjectLiteral.description: Object literal may only specify known properties
TS2353_ObjectLiteral.rootCause: Objects contain properties not in interface
TS2353_ObjectLiteral.solution: Remove invalid properties or update interface

patterns.pattern: Object literal may only specify known properties, and 'showDetailedStats' does not exist

TS18048_PossiblyUndefined.solution: Add optional chaining or null checks

databaseFieldMappings.description: Critical field mappings from Prisma schema to TypeScript usage
databaseFieldMappings.source: CLAUDE.md and agent learning from 7 iterations

importPatterns.description: Common import fixes from agent learning

failedPatterns.description: Patterns that DON'T work - avoid these

antipatterns.reason: Creates more errors than it fixes
antipatterns.evidence: Property Access Agent v1 had 1.8% success rate
antipatterns.impact: Makes code harder to debug, doesn't fix root cause

validationRules.description: Rules that MUST be followed for any fix

rules.rationale: Only accept fixes that improve overall state
rules.enforcement: Global validator checks before/after error count

rules.rationale: Partial fixes often create new errors
rules.enforcement: File must go to 0 errors or don't modify

rules.rule: Use canonical types as single source of truth

rules.enforcement: Change log required for every fix

6.lesson: Root cause fixes work, strict mode reveals real errors

7.lesson: Need global validation to prevent regression

keyInsights: Property access errors (TS2339) are 47% of total - fix these first
Schema-first approach (extending shared types) has highest success rate
Interface changes can expose new errors - need validation
Strict mode TypeScript reveals real error count
Local agent optimization without global validation causes cycles
Complete file fixes are more stable than partial fixes
